caption.title: Future potential suitable habitats for CAS on Africa continent predicted by MaxEnt
caption.p: The letters show predictions for the current, RCP 2050-2.6.RCP 2050-8.5, RCP 2070-2.6, RCP 2070-8.5 (A: Current; B: RCP 2050-2.6; C: RCP 2070-2.6, D: RCP 2050-8.5; E: RCP 2070-8.5). Gray = unsuitable habitat area; Blue = low habitat suitability area; Green = moderate habitat suitability area; Red = highly habitat suitability area. The base map was created with Natural Earth Dataset ( http://www.naturalearthdata.com/).
Click here for additional data file.
